summary: A fast test suite that validates the core functionality of the Latent Consistency Model pipeline, covering dummy component handling, callback mechanisms, inference batch processing, IP‑adapter integration, and various LCM execution modes such as single‑step, multi‑step, and custom timestep configurations.
business_intent: Provide rapid, automated verification of the LCM pipeline to maintain code quality, catch regressions early, and support continuous integration for reliable model deployment.
